‚ÄúYes, they‚Äôre the result of scaling [that hard work].‚Äù Yep. Coming in huge quantities, riches are the result of something that already works being SCALED. The hard work makes the small money. The huge quantities come from the easy work that comes from putting IDEAS in motion
See? $400m -> $1b simply due to consolidating the businesses. Over 100% increase

This is the same as the Raymond Reddington idea. He takes the business that that post office guy, Anthony, is running, and he offers Anthony 10% of a company worth more than 10x more. Schwab takes these companies and combines them. The whole is worth more than the parts (Gestalt). I can do the same thing with Childcares, wherein girls have a small childcare making $8k/mo, and I can offer them 40% partnership of a company in ELS, earning $27k per month. That‚Äôs close to 100% more money that they‚Äôre pulling in, and all because I‚Äôm running the business.
Your mind has no limitations, except those you choose to accept.
Give, before you try to get
You must have a definite purpose. Know what you want, and have a burning desire to possess it
To be successful, you have to know what you want. My idea can be that idea of integrated devices and calendars. Now I just have to tell people that I want it, and I can start fundraising.
All who seek riches must recognize and adapt to themselves to the system that controls all approaches to fortunes, large or small
Capital. Use money ‚Äúfor the good of the public, and to profit themselves.‚Äù
Umm, yeah. Be able to compromise and to cooperate with others
Reach decisions promptly. Change them, if at all, very slowly.
DELEGATE. I should have delegated the photoshop pictures. One day, $5‚Äì$30. And I spent ~15 hours on it, so I can realistically charge 450 for the time.
